item.title: The Estelle
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
This dried bouquet contains a variety of dried florals and grasses: including palm spears, pampas, hill flower. bleached ruscus, bunny tail, and more. This gorgeous bouquet will last a lifetime.

This is a natural product, with any product from mother nature there will be variation, each bouquet will be unique, but will closely resemble the reference photo. 

Bouquets will be shipped ASAP, however due to shipping delays brought on by covid-19 we cannot guarantee delivery dates. Shipping is a flat rate of $15 across Canada/ $25 in US.

The post The Estelle appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Custom Dried Bouquet
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Choose this product for your custom dried bouquet.

  • Allow 2 - 3 weeks for crafting your unique and one of a kind piece.
  • Pricing starts at $115 and is dependant on design and size.
  • Rush orders may be accommodated - email contactyoufloral@gmail.com to inquire.
  • Please provide design inspiration, colour preferences, and any specific requirements.
  • Ultimately, the final design is at the florist's discretion and You Floral reserves the right to use creative license in order to make your bouquet as beautiful as can be!

The post Custom Dried Bouquet appeared first on You Floral.

Choose this product for your custom dried bouquet.

  • Pricing starts at $115 and is dependant on design and size.
  • Rush orders may be accommodated – email contactyoufloral@gmail.com to inquire.
  • Please provide design inspiration, colour preferences, and any specific requirements.
  • Ultimately, the final design is at the florist’s discretion and You Floral reserves the right to use creative license in order to make your bouquet as beautiful as can be!

item.title: The Claudette
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Named after my mother-in-law, Claudette - this white and muted green bouquet is boho and elegant. This dried bouquet contains a variety of dried florals and grasses: including fringe palms, pampas, statice, phleum,artemisia, phalaris, bunny tail, and more. This gorgeous bouquet will last a lifetime.

This bouquet comes optionally wrapped in a white ribbon (no extra cost).

This is a natural product, with any product from mother nature there will be variation, each bouquet will be unique, but will closely resemble the reference photo.

Bouquets will be shipped ASAP, however, due to shipping delays brought on by covid-19 we cannot guarantee delivery dates. Shipping is a flat rate of $15 across Canada/ $25 in US.

The post The Claudette appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Dried Mini Bouquet
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Small dried mini bouquet, this is a small bouquet (Approx 10-12 stems - 6 - 8" tall) - pickup in Victoria/Vernon or ships ($5 shipping). These bouquets are perfect for a mini vase, or use it to DIY your own boutineers. Mix of white florals, each bouquet is a bit different but will contain florals similar to bunny tails/phalaris/phleum/buttons

The post Dried Mini Bouquet appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: The Hazel
item.dc:creator: user
item.description:
Named after my grandmother, Hazel - this cute white natural bouquet has an earthy vibe, just like my grandmother. This dried bouquet contains a variety of dried florals and grasses: including palm fan, bunny tails, pampas, cardus, and more. This gorgeous bouquet will last a lifetime.

This is a natural product, with any product from mother nature there will be variation, each bouquet will be unique, but will closely resemble the reference photo.

Bouquets will be shipped ASAP, however due to shipping delays brought on by covid-19 we cannot guarantee delivery dates. Shipping is a flat rate of $15 across Canada.

The post The Hazel appeared first on You Floral.
